page.title: 17Local Businesses in Weston
page.content:
Weston's village shop cum post office was first opened in 1915. Today it is a family business selling a wide range of commodities and services.
Cavan is a one man ditch and pond clearing business founded 28 years ago and operating from a 300 years old converted water mill.
David Beecroft Ltd is a family company of civil engineering contractors founded in 1963. It employs 27 people most of whom are local.
Norman Machin and Associates are a firm of architects currently operating from Hazel Cottage Studio but planning new offices at the Village School. The firm was founded in 1980 and employs 3 architects. Their work includes the modernisation of character properties.
